CopyReadable(Texture2D, TextureFormat)

Copy and convert a texture to a given format and make it accessible from the CPU.
Note: Uses UnityEngine.Color32 pixel format.

SupportsSetPixel(TextureFormat)

Check whether this texture format supports setting pixel values (eg. SetPixel(int, int, Color), SetPixelData<T>(T[], int, int), SetPixel(int, int, int, Color), etc.

public static bool SupportsSetPixel(this TextureFormat tFormat)

Parameters

Returns
